verses.verse: Great <WH1419> is the Lord <WH3068>, and greatly <WH3966> to be praised <WH1984> in the city <WH5892> of our God <WH430>, in the mountain <WH2022> of his holiness <WH6944>.

Beautiful <WH3303> for situation <WH5131>, the joy <WH4885> of the whole earth <WH776>, is mountain <WH2022> Zion <WH6726>, on the sides <WH3411> of the north <WH6828>, the city <WH7151> of the great <WH7227> King <WH4428>.
God <WH430> is known <WH3045> in her palaces <WH759> for a refuge <WH4869>.
For <WH4428>, behold, the kings were assembled <WH3259>, they passed by <WH5674> together <WH3162>.
They saw <WH7200> it <WH8539>, and so they marveled; they were troubled <WH926>, and hurried away <WH2648>.
Fear <WH7461> took hold <WH270> upon them there <WH2427>, and pain, as of a woman in hardship <WH3205>.
You break <WH7665> the ships <WH591> of Tarshish <WH8659> with a east <WH6921> wind <WH7307>.

As we have heard <WH8085>, so have we seen <WH7200> in the city <WH5892> of the Lord <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, in the city <WH5892> of our God <WH430>: God <WH430> will establish <WH3559> it for <WH5704> ever <WH5769>. Selah <WH5542>.
We have thought <WH1819> of your lovingkindness <WH2617>, O God <WH430>, in the middle <WH7130> of your temple <WH1964>.
According to your name <WH8034>, O God <WH430>, so is your praise <WH8416> unto the ends <WH7099> of the earth <WH776>: your right hand <WH3225> is full <WH4390> of righteousness <WH6664>.
Let mountain <WH2022> Zion <WH6726> rejoice <WH8055>, let the daughters <WH1323> of Judah <WH3063> be glad <WH1523>, because of your judgments <WH4941>.
Walk about <WH5437> Zion <WH6726>, and go round about <WH5362> her <WH5608>: tell the towers there <WH4026>.
Mark <WH7896> you well <WH3820> her bulwarks <WH2430>, consider <WH6448> her palaces <WH759>; that you may tell <WH5608> it to the generation <WH1755> following <WH314>.
For this God <WH430> is our God <WH430> for ever <WH5769> and ever <WH5703>: he will be our guide <WH5090> even unto death <WH4192>.
